Don't like the recent update to the Swiggy App... Food search no longer gives the option to view results restaurants as well as dishes. This used to be so convenient, to quickly view dishes that met the search criteria with a quick scroll, without needing to click into EACH restaurant to see if they even have what you are looking for. Not in the least user friendly :((( suggest roll back to search results they way they used to be.

Dinein cash utilisation is capped to only 200 per bill, whereas cashback amount is 10%. This means one can never use all the Dinein cash amount during redemption at restaurant.. And the Dinein cash will expire mandatorily, which means no value added for recurral visits to restaurants using dineout for redemption of Dinein cash amount.
